website_summaries.verdict: The Philips Sonicare FlexCare Platinum Connected costs as much as trip to the dentist, but it's the best smart toothbrush you can buy.
cons: Potential to get connected phone or tablet wet

customer_reviews.title: Bad tracking
customer_reviews.text: The main selling point of this toothbrush, besides that it's electric, is its ability to track your brushing. Unfortunately, my device was completely unable to track any amount of brushing in the back bottom left, and usually also ran into trouble in the back lower right, back top right, and back upper left. This is despite attempting every angle physically possible. That basically leaves only the fronts, back top middle, and back bottom middle working correctly. I want to know where *I* accidentally missed my brushing, not where the toothbrush accidentally missed my brushing. I hate returning items, especially toothbrushes (who does that?), but this product isn't worth anywhere close to its relatively high price.
customer_reviews.author: Epimachus

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy, these are garbage. Pure garbage.
customer_reviews.text: Holy cow, what a piece of garbage. These toothbrushes don't last more than a year before they stop working. Ask me how I know this? Bought one from Amazon after the previous one stopped working Replaced after 6 months by Amazon after the replacement stopped working Replacement lasted 1 year, ordered a warranty replacement from Philips They sent me a replacement that was broken right out of the box... You have to be kidding me. Please, save your time and money. Buy something else. Anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good toothbrush, but there are less costly alternatives.
customer_reviews.text: I like it but it is not so different to my old Sonicare. The app is a bit of a joke. I wear spectacles - which I need to see the app on my cell phone. Fallout from the bhe brush covers my spectacles with white droplets, which does not improve the situation, although the suggestion that I reduce my hand movements was probably a good one. A good but very overpriced device.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a Sonic Care at the recommendation of my dental hygienist. I had been having some gum bleeding and swelling issues. In just over a week using the app as a guide I have noticed a big difference. No more bleeding and my teeth feel much cleaner. I’d been using a battery operated Oral B and this is a big difference.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this model
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this model! Received 2 of these and both stopped charging. The first stopped charging after only one month and the second one after a few months. This model is junk it was the first model released with Bluetooth and was obviously their test product. Do not buy this model!
customer_reviews.author: Izn

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I think it was worth every penny I paid. The app is basic but helpful. It's a little bigger then a regular tooth brush so it takes a little while to get accustomed to holding it but over all very satisfied. Plus was cheaper here then at the dentist office. 😁
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Sonicare
customer_reviews.text: Well pleased with the investment in this toothbrush. Was borderline needing oral surgery for deep pockets in some teeth. Last two cleanings many pockets improved. They weren't surprised when I said I the only thing I was doing different was this toothbrush. Other patients were saying the same thing. No problems with the app on my S4 phone.
customer_reviews.author: MZ

customer_reviews.title: Toothbrush broke after only 18 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product in September 2018 for $179 plus tax. This week the small mechanism holding the toothbrush broke and we see no way to fix it. Buyer beware that this is a very expensive and perhaps short lived toothbrush. It was for me. Very disappointed after using it for only 18 months. I thought Sonicare would last many many years.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline K.

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: I don’t recommend this toothbrush. I don’t like it as much as my old Sonicare or my partner’s new Sonicare. It’s larger than the other new Sonicare model. My main complaint is how sensitive it is to pushing too hard. It say hardly any contact with your tooth is too much pressure. Also, app that senses how you brush doesn’t sense brushing the chewing surface of your teeth as brushing.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This was my 3rd Sonicare toothbrush over the past 15 years. Love it! Cons: not all settings work with the app, the handle is slippery and hard to hold. Pros: does a great job cleaning your teeth and gums.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Floyd

customer_reviews.title: I like this idea
customer_reviews.text: If you put any pressure on your teeth whatsoever the “safety” turns off the vibration to apparently save you from yourself. I like this idea, but the pressure that turns off the brush is so light you can’t even brush your teeth!
customer_reviews.author: Mark W

customer_reviews.title: Electric toothbrush.
customer_reviews.text: The dentist recommended this name and brand of brush and you had it. Was a birthday gift and it was what he wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Vernon Wunnenberg

customer_reviews.title: I like sonicare and the idea of the app is a ...
customer_reviews.text: I like sonicare and the idea of the app is a good one, but it doesn’t really give you a good idea of coverage or technique, plus using the app while brushing is cumbersome.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew B.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent electric toothbrush
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband. He is very pleased. The app is a nice bonus. Heads change easily.
customer_reviews.author: bdbp01

customer_reviews.title: leaves teeth super clean
customer_reviews.text: the only thing i was disappointed about was not buying this product sooner. perfect speed options, light in weight, phone app guide, most importantly litterly leaves your teeth super clean. highly recommended for anyone that takes cleaning your teeth seriously.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Good toothbrush but not at all
customer_reviews.text: It's quite frustrating that application from Phillips only works in determined countries... for example, the app doesn't work in Colombia and tbh, I had decided to take this toothbrush because of the application...
customer_reviews.author: RafaelTT

customer_reviews.title: I bought it in January 2017 and lasted until October ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought it in January 2017 and lasted until October 21, 2017and would not recharge and I could not open it to change the battery
customer_reviews.author: Ernesto Santana

customer_reviews.title: Great toothbrush but lousy app
customer_reviews.text: Great toothbrush but lousy app. The toothbrush could only connect with the app for about two weeks. After that no luck. Not a big deal, just an annoyance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a Great toothbrush , I had to replace mine after a few years the charger just stopped working so I know this one very well ! It does a Greta job leaving your teeth very fresh and clean !
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best toothbrush out there. Keeps my gum disease at bay. Seller shipped on time.
customer_reviews.author: Katrin Haberstock

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it for the bluetooth app
customer_reviews.text: The bluetooth app is absolutely worthless. 0 stars. You'll try it once and never use it again. You have to take a 4 question survey after each brushing. Who has time for that? The whole gimmick feels like part of the Philips marketing machine gone wrong. I gave the toothbrush 4 stars. I replaced a 2 year Philips Diamond Clean that had a chronically problematic on/off button. This Philips product seems to be well built, but is slippery in your hands. The saving grace here are the new heads. Bristles are much denser and clean better.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Great. The quality is good. I like it very much. If the delivery speed is faster, I should have used it long ago.
customer_reviews.author: Ernie F.

customer_reviews.title: Best Cleaning You Can Give Yourself At Home!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Works perfectly.... I can REALLY tell the difference in my teeth and gums just from using this toothbrush. BIG Difference! This toothbrush was recommended to me by my periodontist, and i'm glad I listened.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Peoples

customer_reviews.title: Love the toothbrush
customer_reviews.text: Love the toothbrush. I have had one for over a month now. Ordered one for my husband and opened the package to discover one of the toothbrush heads was not in there. Will keep since the main head is there but disappointed it was missing something
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad
customer_reviews.text: Not bad, just wish the handle had a better grip.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: This toothbrush broke in less than a year - 2nd time
customer_reviews.text: This is the second sonic care toothbrush that I have bought that has broke in less than a year, their products are losing quality
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Allen Smith

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last!
customer_reviews.text: This product stopped working after just over 1 year of use. Very disappointed! For this price I expected it to last much longer.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa M Starr

customer_reviews.title: Another amazing product by Phillips
customer_reviews.text: Another amazing product by Phillips. This is the best toothbrush ever. Buy it !
customer_reviews.author: Aloha

customer_reviews.title: Best toothbrush ever
customer_reviews.text: This model may be a bit expensive, but it's entirely worth the cost! Best toothbrush ever!
customer_reviews.author: Cat Owner

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Smile
customer_reviews.text: Love it! App took some troubleshooting, but the toothbrush is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this toothbrush, my gums feel nice and massaged after using.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Clearwater

customer_reviews.title: great features
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I'm not using the smart-phone feature as much as I thought I would although I did find that it provided a structure for where to brush and how long. Of course if you go off track it doesn't know that... My favorite, and much needed, feature is the "brushing too hard alert". It actually interferes with the intensity of the vibration and makes a noise too. It actually saves you from doing damage. For those of us with receding gum lines this is a great feature. The price is really hefty though.
customer_reviews.author: Fresh Water

customer_reviews.title: 4 months old, nothing but problems
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for 4 months. All of a sudden, the brush either won't connect to the app, or it can't detect whether I'm actually brushing the area indicated by the app. Keep resetting it to fix it. Then the app will crash in the middle of a session and the problems start again. Aggravating
customer_reviews.author: Shelly ForkelTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: THIS VERY EXPENSIVE TOOTHBRUSH DOES NOT HOLD A CHARGE
customer_reviews.text: The toothbrush works fine if put on the charger each night. However, I took a vacation where the toothbrush wasn't on the charger for about 8-10 hours. Each time, the toothbrush was dead. Spending well over $100 for a toothbrush only to find out that it doesn't hold a charge for more than half a day is ridiculous. I wish I could give a 0-star review I contacted the vendor and never heard back from them. AVOID THIS MANUFACTURER AND TOOTHBRUSH!!! DO NOT BUY THIS TOOTHBRUSH.
customer_reviews.author: J.A.F.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent toothbrush with Bluetooth feature, helps to monitor the brushing pattern and keep with the hygiene
customer_reviews.author: Finny Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Nice! Easy to use and gets my mouth feeling ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice! Easy to use and gets my mouth feeling great.
customer_reviews.author: Sue K.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth connectivity is unreliabe, connecting about 2 in every 5 attempts and a time waster trying to connect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If app doesn't work, what good is the hardware?
customer_reviews.text: Just received the brush today. Appears to be working normally (the brush itself) however, whenever I connect to the app on iOS, it completely rebooots my phone every time! I have tried deleting the app and re-installing. Nothing works. Turn on brush, open app, phone REBOOTS. Well this brush is getting rebooted right back to Philips because the main advertised feature is obviously not working! Do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: Mason

customer_reviews.title: Not connected
customer_reviews.text: After buying this product I found that the app is not compatible with my device. The app reviews are bad. I was going to download the "kids" version but it asks for access to basically everything on your "kids" phone. Really inappropriate. So the Bluetooth is a bust.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly M.

customer_reviews.title: It's ok but a bit disappointing
customer_reviews.text: It's an ok toothbrush. But it is expensive for the benefit. The internet connection is kind of clunky and disappointing. Doesn't work for me. If expense is an issue buy a no internet version.
customer_reviews.author: Richard O. Michaud

customer_reviews.title: This toothbrush Loud!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if it's just the power, but this tooth brush is loud! If you can get passed that, this is a great tooth brush and the app tracking is motivating.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Buckley

customer_reviews.title: Great Slim Electric Toothbrush
customer_reviews.text: This is a great electric toothbrush. I upgraded from Sonicate's Essence series and am very happy with this model; it's slimmer and has a smaller counter footprint. I have not used the app and bluetooth functionality, but suffice it say if you want to get highly analytical with your brushing this is the one to get. I do like the sensor that throttles it back if you brush too aggressively. It also has a nice beginner mode if you're new to electric toothbrushes...it helps you ease into the (very different) sensation of power brushing. I haven't traveled with it yet but I like the travel case very much. Overall highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Brad M.

customer_reviews.title: Broke...again! but Sonicare is replacing it for free.
customer_reviews.text: Only lasted a little over a year, 389 days to be exact! This expensive toothbrush cleans well, but did NOT last long. I'm so disappointed it is broken! This is the second Sonicare that has bit the dust for me; too early in my opinion. Save your money, buy the cheaper versions of Sonicare toothbrush. Update: Sonicare Customer Service was very helpful and are replacing and shipping a new toothbrush (same model) for free as there is a two year warranty.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: A Piece of Junk
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT!!! Not ready for primetime is correct. The software never worked...period. Tried every trick in the book, but with no success. After two months an extra buzzing sound started when in use, and now the handle vibrates more than the brush itself. A piece of junk, and Philips should be ashamed to put their good name on it. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: C. Comforts

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is really poor.
customer_reviews.text: Battery life lasts less than 2 days. I travel on Friday night at 7pm, it's dead by Sunday morning at 11am. I put it to charge Sunday night at 10pm, it's still not even fully charged on Monday morning at 8am. I expected more. Cleans teeth well. I used all the special features like twice, not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Mer584

customer_reviews.title: Cannot connect to app on phone via Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth don’t work, tried with 2 different phone. Likely a defective unit, but too much a hassle to do an exchange since basic brushing works. Have a different Philip toothbrush that work fine with one of the phones we tried, so we are certain the problem lies with this one we purchased from amazon
customer_reviews.author: Somebody

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: A very solid performer. I have used Sonicare for a few years now and recently bought this one. I like the stronger action. Also, over the last few years my dentist as noted that my gums are healthier than they used to be and I have few problems now with my gums. Also, zero cavities.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: BEST TOOTHBRUSH EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this toothbrush- I feel like I haven't even been brushing my teeth for all these years! I can take or leave the app, but the brush makes me feel like I just got a dental cleaning!
customer_reviews.author: DHB

customer_reviews.title: App does not work
customer_reviews.text: I love Sonicare toothbrushes BUT no need to spend the extra money for this as it will not reliably connect to the app. Great idea but fails to connect so the $$ were wasted! I would buy another Sonicare but skip the one with the app. Sonicare user for the past 18 years.
customer_reviews.author: jk

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toothbrush, connectivity is pointless.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a toothbrush. It’s a great tooth brush. It’s the best tooth brush I’ve ever owned. The app it connects to is not useful or practical, but the toothbrush is still really great. Get it, just don’t waste your time with the app.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Kaylor

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: wish it was easier to connect to app. but didn't buy for that reason alone.
customer_reviews.author: Mark M Murphy

customer_reviews.title: I am amazed at how much the battery lasts
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product now for 1 month. I am amazed at how much the battery lasts. My gums are healthier. I no longer bleed when brushing my teeth! I will never use a regular tooth brush. Investing in your oral health is totally worth it!
customer_reviews.author: LIna Ortega

customer_reviews.title: I love Sonicare. I was so sad when my 10 ...
customer_reviews.text: I love Sonicare. I was so sad when my 10 year-old brush died, but I was excited for the app and guidance. I'm annoyed that it doesn't pair in the deep clean mode.
customer_reviews.author: Tina T

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toothbrush
customer_reviews.text: Had one before and it works way better than oral b.
customer_reviews.author: SKya1

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my grandson for Christmas. His mom ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandson for Christmas. His mom says he is now brushing his teeth 4 times a day. It is my 3rd toothbrush and is very high quality.
customer_reviews.author: GAIL RIDDELL

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth smart connectivity is gimmicky and useless
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth smart connectivity is gimmicky and useless. Buy the basic one or the diamond clean for the fancy industrial design.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable
customer_reviews.text: Product died after 12.5 months... Expect much more from Philips at this price. Will see if they will honor warranty
customer_reviews.author: cat2525

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love this toothbrush! I felt like I just left the dentist office after the first use. I love that the app tells me exactly where I did and didn't brush, and how much pressure I should be using. It even reminds me to use floss and mouthwash!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Superior Dental Care System
customer_reviews.text: Great design, easy to use, long battery life. Superior product, I am very pleased with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied Mom

customer_reviews.title: Easy hack for good oral hygiene
customer_reviews.text: Excellent way to develop and maintain good oral hygiene! Super easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: HV

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great toothbrush and a noticeable upgrade from the prior generation which I also own.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Andersen

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth app not ready for prime time
customer_reviews.text: Don't pay extra for Bluetooth.... The app is ridiculously buggy and useless. Surprisingly, the kids version works extremely well so I can't figure out how Phillips managed to charge so much more for this one and completely botch it.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Motion sensor stopped working, app crashes my iPhone.
customer_reviews.text: Good effort, but not ready for primetime. The Sonicate iOS app not only crashes frequently, but sometimes it also completely crashes my phone! Then after three days the feature that shows where the brush is in your mouth stopped working (guess the motion sensor broke?). The app UX is also poor, esp the setup. But it's a great idea — I hope they go back to the drawing board and try again.
customer_reviews.author: Yinyue

customer_reviews.title: Battery lasted only two days.
customer_reviews.text: The charge in my toothbrush lasted only two days. The toothbrush is great when it is charged. Mine was fully charged on Thursday before I flew. By Friday night, the battery was dead!
customer_reviews.author: Sherri

product_meta.title: Philips Sonicare Flexcare Platinum Connected Rechargeable Toothbrush
product_meta.description:
Style:Flexcare Connected ToothbrushPhilips Sonicare' s most revolutionary toothbrush to date! Flex Care Platinum Connected takes the guesswork out of oral care. Smart sensors send your brushing data to the free Sonicare app via Bluetooth wireless technology, providing you personalized coaching and instant feedback for the most complete clean possible! From the #1 recommended brand by Dental Professionals. As per the manual, consumers should start brushing at the upper, right quadrant of their mouth. If not started in this position the App will effectively align with the brushing activity. This toothbrush is compatible with android phone with the following OS: • Version 4.4- Kitkat • Version 5.1- Lollipop • Version 6.0- Marshmallow • Version 7.0- Nougat+

BRAND STORY
By Philips
feature_bullets: Smart brushing, superior results: 10x more plaque removal and healthier gums in 2 weeks vs. a manual toothbrush
Featuring innovative Smart Sensor technology: Location sensor shows where you're brushing too little for better coverage. Pressure sensor lets you know if you are brushing too hard.
The Touchup feature provides customized guidance based on your personal brushing data so you can immediately address any missed areas and achieve a more complete clean.
Set goals, track progress and receive personalized coaching, tips and alerts. Download the free Sonicare app from the Apple App Store or Google Play
95% of users agree Flex Care Platinum Connected is the most effective product they have used for building healthier brushing habits. Power 110-220 Volts

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
